DOC.brief_title: Delphinus SoftVue Prospective Case Collection - ARM 2
DOC.detailed_description: MEDICAL DEVICES : - SoftVue™ ( SV ) automate whole breast ultrasound system , 510 ( k ) Cleared B‐Mode ultrasound breast imaging , manufacture Delphinus Medical Technologies . - SoftVue™ device modification ( software , hardware , user‐interface ) , safety‐tested human use complete feasibility , verification , validation test routine part product development perform accordance FDA 21 CFR 812.2 ( b ) , manufacture Delphinus Medical Technologies . - Full‐field digital mammography ( FFDM ) , FDA Approved breast screen diagnosis , various manufacturer . ( If clinically indicate ) - Digital breast tomosynthesis ( DBT ) , FDA Approved breast screen diagnosis , various manufacturer . - Handheld Ultrasound ( HHUS ) , FDA-Cleared diagnostic breast imaging , various manufacturer . ( If clinically indicate ) - Other diagnostic test medical device examination breast , include , limited MRI , BSGI , PET , biopsy , elastography , order license physician , clinically indicate . OBJECTIVES : - Primary : To establish library case use future SoftVue™ research study , user training , marketing . - Secondary : Determine frequency severity adverse event ( AEs ) evaluate safety SoftVue . ENDPOINTS : From multiple clinical site whichever come first : • Up 1,000 total enrol subject SITES : At least six ( ≥ 6 ) qualify clinical site United States - MQSA Certified - Digital Breast Tomosynthesis Screening Program Implemented - Academic , Community Hospital , Private Practice Setting PROJECT DESIGN AND PROCEDURES : - Potential participant recruit group woman present diagnostic evaluation biopsy multiple clinical site . - All participant complete standard care diagnostic evaluation recommend physician - Eligible patient receive SV scan time schedule diagnostic appointment , preferably prior biopsy - Investigators sit compare SV image accompany diagnostic image pathology result - No clinical SV interpretation perform clinical intervention make change base SV image - All evaluation result , diagnosis treatment outcomes record - Cancer status participant survey program entry include completion physician recommend diagnostic workup - A case determine cancer negative participant non-malignant breast biopsy finding confirm non-suspicious diagnostic breast imaging finding - A case determine cancer positive pathological evaluation confirms breast cancer diagnosis ( malignancy ) STATISTICAL ANALYSIS : - Demographic characteristic ( age , race , ethnicity ) baseline characteristic ( e.g. , project arm , project site , breast density , lesion‐specific characteristic ) tabulate participant . - A flow diagram table illustrate patient disposition ( `` accountability patient cohort '' ) include reason ineligibility and/or unevaluability . - Safety summarize enrolled woman . With exception anticipate event , adverse event ( AEs ) serious adverse event ( SAEs ) , occur time enrollment ( SoftVue ) 24 hour follow conclusion SoftVue exam , record . - A separate statistical plan develop future analysis include justification sample size , applicable requirement FDAAA 801 , register separately order share result .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Female Any race ethnicity Age 18 old Findings concern clinical breast exam image Scheduled diagnostic imaging , needle biopsy , excisional biopsy , postneedlebiopsy visit Diagnostic imaging assessment category BIRADS 4 5 willing undergo biopsy ( y ) , per Principal Investigator , subject 's case would beneficial use lesion atlas teach library Agrees contact site staff recommend biopsy complete within appropriate time frame Exclusion Criteria Unwilling/unable comply protocol followup recommendation Lumpectomy excisional biopsy primary region interest perform prior SoftVue imaging , sufficient finding make case useful lesion atlas teach library Weight exceed 350lbs Currently pregnant lactate patient self‐report Weeping rash , open wound , unhealed sore breast Bilateral mastectomy Unable lay prone scan table 15 minute
